symbols.name: sap.ui.generic.template
symbols.description: SAPUI5 library that provides functionality used by Smart Template Applications.

symbols.name: sap.ui.generic.template.AppComponent

constructor.description: Base class for application components used in smart template applications.

methods.name: createContent
methods.description: Creates the content of the component.

methods.name: exit
methods.description: Cleans up the component instance before destruction.

methods.name: extend

parameters.name: sClassName
parameters.description: Name of the class being created

parameters.name: oClassInfo
parameters.description: Object literal with information about the class

parameters.name: FNMetaImpl
parameters.description: Constructor function for the metadata object; if not given, it defaults to sap.ui.core.ElementMetadata

methods.description: Creates a new subclass of class sap.ui.generic.template.AppComponent with name sClassName and enriches it with the information contained in oClassInfo. oClassInfo might contain the same kind of information as described in {@link sap.ui.core.UIComponent.extend}.

methods.name: getApplicationController
methods.description: Returns the reference to the application controller instance that has been created by the AppComponent.

methods.name: getConfig
methods.description: Returns the application configuration metadata that has been created and/or specified in the app descriptor.

methods.name: getMetadata
methods.description: Returns a metadata object for class sap.ui.generic.template.AppComponent.

methods.name: getNavigationController
methods.description: Returns the reference to the navigation controller instance that has been created by AppComponent.

methods.name: getTransactionController
methods.description: Returns the reference to the transaction controller instance.

methods.name: init
methods.description: Initializes the AppComponent instance after creation.
